sourcesContent: import _slicedToArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/slicedToArray";import BaseFilters from"./BaseFilters";var BRIGHTNESS_CONST=.08,ADJUST_RGB_CONST=[1,1.03,1.05],SATURATION_CONST=.12;function Lark(a){for(var b=a.data,c=b.length,d=0;d<c;d+=4){var e=BaseFilters.brightness([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]],BRIGHTNESS_CONST),f=_slicedToArray(e,3);b[d]=f[0],b[d+1]=f[1],b[d+2]=f[2];var g=BaseFilters.adjustRGB([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]],ADJUST_RGB_CONST),h=_slicedToArray(g,3);b[d]=h[0],b[d+1]=h[1],b[d+2]=h[2];var j=BaseFilters.saturation([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]],SATURATION_CONST),k=_slicedToArray(j,3);b[d]=k[0],b[d+1]=k[1],b[d+2]=k[2]}}export default Lark;
